argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | evlsca.q | |- Q = ( I eval S ) |
| 2 |  | evlsca.w | |- W = ( I mPoly S ) |
| 3 |  | evlsca.b | |- B = ( Base ` S ) |
| 4 |  | evlsca.a | |- A = ( algSc ` W ) |
| 5 |  | evlsca.i | |- ( ph -> I e. V ) |
| 6 |  | evlsca.s | |- ( ph -> S e. CRing ) |
| 7 |  | evlsca.x | |- ( ph -> X e. B ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ( I evalSub S ) ` B ) = ( ( I evalSub S ) ` B ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( I mPoly ( S |`s B ) ) = ( I mPoly ( S |`s B ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( S |`s B ) = ( S |`s B ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( algSc ` ( I mPoly ( S |`s B ) ) ) = ( algSc ` ( I mPoly ( S |`s B ) ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_crngring | |- ( S e. CRing -> S e. Ring ) |
| 13 | 3 | #P_subrgid | |- ( S e. Ring -> B e. ( SubRing ` S ) ) |
| 14 | 6, 12, 13 | #P_3syl | |- ( ph -> B e. ( SubRing ` S ) ) |
| 15 | 8, 1, 9, 10, 2, 3, 11, 4, 5, 6, 14, 7 | #P_evlsscasrng | |- ( ph -> ( ( ( I evalSub S ) ` B ) ` ( ( algSc ` ( I mPoly ( S |`s B ) ) ) ` X ) ) = ( Q ` ( A ` X ) ) ) |
| 16 | 8, 9, 10, 3, 11, 5, 6, 14, 7 | #P_evlssca | |- ( ph -> ( ( ( I evalSub S ) ` B ) ` ( ( algSc ` ( I mPoly ( S |`s B ) ) ) ` X ) ) = ( ( B ^m I ) X. { X } ) ) |
| 17 | 15, 16 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( ph -> ( Q ` ( A ` X ) ) = ( ( B ^m I ) X. { X } ) ) |
